instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONT: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. UTILS: Create a 'cn' utility in /lib/utils.js for tailwind class merging.
4. COMPONENTS: Do not use complex Shadcn components if they are not pre-installed. Build simple, robust atomic components using the design tokens.
5. CHAT: Implement the chat interface as a 'Floating Island' or a distinct central panel. It must NOT look like a basic terminal. Use the 'chat_bubbles' styles defined above.
6. ROADMAP: Visualize the career path as a vertical timeline or a step-by-step card reveal. Do not use a plain list.
7. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links) MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute (e.g., 'data-testid="chat-input"').
8. EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx extensions. Do not use .ts or .tsx.
9. NO-GO: Do not use dark gradients for this app. Keep it light, airy, and optimistic.
10. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the landing page. For the dashboard, use Lucide icons.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
